tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE conflict_resolution_cases (
 case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 participant_name VARCHAR(255),
 issue_description TEXT,
 resolution_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE case_progress (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    issue_id INT,
    resolution_id INT,
    progress_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (issue_id) REFERENCES issues(issue_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (resolution_id) REFERENCES resolutions(resolution_id)
);

CREATE TABLE case_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    event_date DATE NOT NULL,
    event_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES case_progress(case_id)
);
